nodes.text: Chalan Talosi was a female Twi'lek mechanic in galaxy during the Galactic Civil War who served aboard a ship with Javlin and WAC-77. At one point they were pursued by Black Sun starfighters and Talosi had to scramble to fix the ship. She once spoke about the tools available to the profession.
Chalan Talosi appears in the opening story in Fantasy Flight Games' 2016 roleplaying game sourcebook Special Modifications.
